# QuickDapp Documentation - LLM-friendly Format

This directory contains LLM-optimized documentation for QuickDapp.

Each version has its own llms.txt file containing the full documentation
in plain text format, suitable for use as context in LLM conversations.

## Available Versions

- 3.10.2 (latest): /docs-versions/3.10.2/llms.txt
- 3.10.1: /docs-versions/3.10.1/llms.txt
- 3.10.0: /docs-versions/3.10.0/llms.txt
- 3.9.1: /docs-versions/3.9.1/llms.txt
- 3.9.0: /docs-versions/3.9.0/llms.txt
- 3.8.0: /docs-versions/3.8.0/llms.txt
- 3.7.0: /docs-versions/3.7.0/llms.txt
- 3.6.0: /docs-versions/3.6.0/llms.txt
- 3.5.3: /docs-versions/3.5.3/llms.txt
- 3.5.2: /docs-versions/3.5.2/llms.txt
- 3.5.1: /docs-versions/3.5.1/llms.txt
- 3.5.0: /docs-versions/3.5.0/llms.txt

## Usage

To use this documentation with an LLM:
1. Fetch the llms.txt file for the version you need
2. Include the content in your LLM context/prompt
3. Ask questions about QuickDapp development
